sections.summary:
Personable CAD Designer/Drafter who communicates openly and effectively with all involved, from construction site workers to company CEOs.
Successfully sees projects through from initial planning stages to completion.Highly skilled with broad expertise. Successful at anticipating future
issues and implementing creative solutions.
Highlights
Map creation software
Land development planning
Topographic studies
Erosion and sedimentation control
Surveying
Technical plan execution
Local municipality projects
Civil 3D
Land use approval process
AutoCAD specialist
Construction surveying
Water piping design
Permit applications
Complex problem solver
Inland Empire regional knowledge
Advanced critical thinking
Highly accurate
Strong decision maker
Independent worker
